row.entry: This panel allows to quickly select images, according to various criteria.

sect4.title: select all
sect4.para: Select all images in the current view (collection), with respect to filters.

sect4.title: invert selection
sect4.para: Select all images that are not currently selected.

sect4.title: select film roll
sect4.para: Select all images that are in the same filmroll as the currently selected images.

sect4.title: select untouched
sect4.para: Select all images that have not been developed yet.
